# <a name="how-to-remove-autogenerated-columns-from-a-windows-forms-datagridview-control"></a><span data-ttu-id="13294-102">Procedure: rimuovere le colonne generate automaticamente da un controllo DataGridView di Windows Form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="13294-102">How to: Remove Autogenerated Columns from a Windows Forms DataGridView Control</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="13294-103">Quando il controllo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> è impostato in modo da generare automaticamente le colonne in base ai dati provenienti dall'origine dati, è possibile omettere selettivamente determinate colonne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="13294-103">When your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is set to autogenerate its columns based on data from its data source, you can selectively omit certain columns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="13294-104">Questa operazione può essere eseguita chiamando il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> sulla raccolta di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="13294-104">You can do this by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="13294-105">In alternativa, è possibile nascondere le colonne dalla vista impostando la proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> su `false`.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="13294-105">Alternatively, you can hide columns from view by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="13294-106">Questa tecnica è utile quando si desidera visualizzare le colonne nascoste in determinate condizioni o quando è necessario accedere ai dati nelle colonne senza visualizzarli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="13294-106">This technique is useful when you want to display the hidden columns in certain conditions, or when you need to access the data in the columns without displaying it.</span></span>  
  
### <a name="to-remove-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="13294-107">Per rimuovere le colonne generate automaticamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="13294-107">To remove autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="13294-108">Chiamare il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> sulla raccolta di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="13294-108">Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#111)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#111)]  
  
### <a name="to-hide-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="13294-109">Per nascondere le colonne generate automaticamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="13294-109">To hide autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="13294-110">Impostare la proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> della colonna su `false`.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="13294-110">Set the column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#112)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#112)]

## <a name="compiling-the-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="13294-112">Compilazione del codice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="13294-112">Compiling the Code</span></span>  
 <span data-ttu-id="13294-113">L'esempio presenta i requisiti seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="13294-113">This example requires:</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="13294-114">Un controllo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> denominato `dataGridView1` associato a una tabella che contiene `Fax` e `CustomerID` colonne, ad esempio la tabella `Customers` nel database di esempio Northwind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="13294-114">A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control named `dataGridView1` bound to a table that contains `Fax` and `CustomerID` columns, such as the `Customers` table in the Northwind sample database.</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="13294-115">Riferimenti agli assembly <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType>.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="13294-115">References to the <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> assemblies.</span></span>
